text: Vera Chuvashova (; born 7 October 1959) is a Russian former middle-distance runner who competed in the 1500 metres. She set personal bests of 1:58.12 minutes for the 800 metres and 4:05.73 minutes for the 1500 m.Vera Chuvashova. All Athletics. Retrieved on 2016-07-30. She represented Russia at the 1993 World Championships in Athletics.Vera Chuvashova. IAAF. Retrieved on 2016-07-30. Chuvashova was twice national champion at the Soviet Indoor Athletics Championships, winning over 800 m in 1986 and in the 1000 metres in 1990.Soviet Indoor Championships. GBR Athletics. Retrieved on 2016-07-30. She was runner-up to Derartu Tulu in the 3000 metres at the 1992 IAAF World Cup.IAAF World Cup. GBR Athletics. Retrieved on 2016-07-30. She topped the field in the 1500 m at the 1993 European Cup.European Cup. GBR Athletics. title: Vera Chuvashova
